thread.section_title: Doubletree by Hilton - London Islington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic Staff
thread.title_full: Fantastic Staff - Review of Doubletree by Hilton - London Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: h0lidayhappy24
title: Fantastic Staff
text:
Excellent hotel we chose it for the fact it was just round the corner from where we were doing the Crystal Maze. We had a very early flight and we're just going to leave our bags and do a bit of sightseeing but the lovely lady on the desk let us check in early. The warm cookie you get on a arrival was a very welcome touch.
The room was spacious, large comfy bed and dual aspect view.
Had food and drinks in the bar late on in the evening and it had a great atmosphere.
All staff are fantastic they are credit to the hotel.
